selected_quotes: “All social science data are rooted in cultural values and symbols.” #socialnetworkanalysis
This updated 4e features a new chapter on data collection, covering a crucial phase of the #research process.
What is #socialnetworkanalysis? Read the 1st chapter of John Scott's new Fourth Edition for FREE
This new 4e reiterates the continued importance of #socialnetworkanalysis in an increasingly interconnected world
Practical exercises including real-world examples of #socialnetworks enable your students to apply their learning
